item.title: Intro to Node
item.description: What is Node and why to use it? What is Node? Node.js is a JS runtime built on top of Google’s opensource V8 Js Engine. Node helps us to run JS outside the browser. It acts like a container to run JS code. V8 engine executes the JS code. Why Node? With help of Node, we can use JS on server-side of web development. We can build fast, highly scalable applications.
